stand.ripplez_hp.hermit_purple.desc: A power-type vine like Stand, Its main power consist of gathering information, due this it doesn't have good combat capabilities but they can be enhanced if the stand is infused with hamon
stand.ripplez_hp.emperor.desc: An Gun Item power-type Stand, It can shoot bullets those follow your targets in a close range, it's not that good by itself so maybe you should search an ally
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_vine.desc: Use hermit purple as a whip to attack your enemies, you can infuse it hamon if you have learned hamon infusion
jojo_ripples.skill.cringe.desc: Deal emotional damage to your opponent
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_doxx.desc: Exposes the target location into a map
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_doxx.controls: Special ability, Shift to increase the map Zoom
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_target.desc: Opens a menu that let you select an specific target to use the spirit divination. You need your main hand empty and a map in you offhand to perform this
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_block.desc: It protects you from any contact damage that isn't a projectile
jojo_ripples.skill.emp_target.desc: Cycle through the target emperor generic target types
jojo_ripples.skill.emp_stand_target.desc: Turn the entity you see into the Emperor's target
jojo_ripples.skill.emp_stand_target.cont: Click to target the entity on sight
gui.hermitpurpletarget.title: Hermit Purple target select
gui.hermitpurpletarget.search_empty: Couldn't find any target with that name
ripplez_hp.type.non: Just a Gun, I wish you are happy
